actions: Tonifies Qi, astringes sweat, generates fluids, quiets the Spirit and calms and contains Heart Qi.
With Ren Shen and Mai Men Dong, for exhaustion of Qi and Yin with shortness of breath, coughing, and thirst and spontaneous night sweats with Qi Deficiency.
With Huang Qi, for Yang Deficiency with spontaneous sweating.
With Mu Li, Huang Qi, Fu Xiao Mai, Ma Huang Gen and Suan Zao Ren, for spontaneous sweating due to Qi Deficiency.
Clears the Heart and eliminates irritability.
With Mai Men Dong and Wu Wei Zi, for night sweats.
With Fu Xiao Mai, for spontaneous sweating due to Qi Deficiency and night sweats due to Yin Deficiency.
Tonifies Heart Qi and calms the Spirit.
With Huang Qi, for Qi Deficiency with general debility, anorexia and spontaneous sweat.
Nourishes Heart Yin, tonifies Liver Blood, calms the Spirit, astringes sweat and generates fluids..
Nourishes the Heart, calms the Spirit and astringes Yin Deficiency sweat.

With Suan Zao Ren, strongly quiets the Spirit, calms the emotions, enriches Yin and Blood, stops night sweats and treats palpitations, irritability and insomnia due to Yin and Blood Deficiency failing to nourish the Heart and Liver.
Calms the Spirit and relieves constraint.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.

symptoms: Symptoms worse after exertion or when tired
